item.description:
Cost: Whatever you pick or purchase

ttp://www.doeorchards.com

Orchard Phone: 978-772-4139

We'll try a different place this time, Doe Orchards in Harvard, MA. Come spend an early fall afternoon in fragrant orchards and pick as many apples as you like. Doe Orchards also has a store for cider, pumpkins, and other goodies. So that we can arrange to meet once we're at the orchard, please RSVP. Time for the Beanstalks to do some harvesting! Rain or shine.

Directions:

BY CAR:

Take Route 2 to Exit 38B to "AYER/GROTON" - RT.110/111 Drive North 1.5 miles. Doe Orchards is on the left. Watch for signs.

Â 

MBTA COMMUTER RAIL: We are 1 mile from the Ayer stop on the Fitchburg/ South Acton line from the North Station.

NASHUA RIVER RAIL TRAIL: We are 1 mile from the Trail head in downtown Ayer.
item.name: Apple Picking
